diagnoses: Connective tissue disease (e.g., systemic lupus erythematosus, rheumatoid arthritis)

justification: Poor healing, irritability, and dysgeusia are common symptoms of diabetes.}, {diagnosis: Vitamin D deficiency
justification: Bone pain, fatigue, and muscle weakness are common symptoms of vitamin D deficiency. It can also impair wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Hypothyroidism
justification: Hypothyroidism can cause fatigue, muscle aches, joint pain, and constipation. It can also contribute to dry skin and hair, which can impair wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Anemia
justification: Anemia can cause fatigue, shortness of breath, and pale skin. It can also delay wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD)
justification: IBD can cause abdominal pain, diarrhea, and weight loss. It can also lead to nutritional deficiencies that impair wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Kidney disease
justification: Kidney disease can cause fatigue, itching, and bone pain. It can also impair wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Liver disease
justification: Liver disease can cause fatigue, jaundice, and easy bruising or bleeding. It can also impair wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Cancer

justification: Cancer can cause a wide range of symptoms, including fatigue, weight loss, and pain. It can also impair wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Autoimmune diseases (e.g., lupus, rheumatoid arthritis)
justification: Autoimmune diseases can cause a wide range of symptoms, including fatigue, pain, and inflammation. They can also impair wound healing.}, {diagnosis: Infection
justification: Infections can cause a wide range of symptoms, including fever, fatigue, and pain. They can also delay wound healing.}
